mapper.sql: SELECT R.ID, R.ARTICLE_ID, R.REPLIER_ID, R.REPLIER_NAME, R.BODY, IF(R.ACCEPTED_ON!=null,'true','false') AS ACCEPTED, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply_vote V WHERE V.REPLY_ID=R.ID AND V.VOTING='UP') AS UP_VOTE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply_vote V WHERE V.REPLY_ID=R.ID AND V.VOTING='DOWN') AS DOWN_VOTE_COUNT, R.REPLIED_ON, R.UPDATED_ON, R.ACCEPTED_ON, (R.REPLIER_ID=#{myId}) AS REPLIED_BY_ME, (SELECT COUNT(*)>0 FROM reply_vote V WHERE V.REPLY_ID=R.ID AND V.VOTER_ID=#{myId} AND V.VOTING='UP') AS UP_VOTED_BY_ME, (SELECT COUNT(*)>0 FROM reply_vote V WHERE V.REPLY_ID=R.ID AND V.VOTER_ID=#{myId} AND V.VOTING='DOWN') AS DOWN_VOTED_BY_ME
mapper.select:
FROM reply R
ORDER BY R.REPLIED_ON ASC
